Tor linnorms dwell in the tallest volcanic mountains, either within naturally formed caverns or molten craters. A tor linnorm's temper can be as hot and destructive as the magma the creature resembles. **[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35)): DC 44 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 [Tor Linnorm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3086) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 222 1.1 **Perception** +37; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 60 feet, [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +40, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +37 **Str** +11 **Dex** +8 **Con** +9 **Int** -1 **Wis** +8 **Cha** +9 --- **AC** 47 **Fort** +38 **Ref** +35 **Will** +33 +1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) **HP** 440 , regeneration 20 (deactivated by [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2916)) **Immunities** [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=566), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696) **Weaknesses** cold iron 15 **Curse of Boiling Blood** ([curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=566), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676)) When a creature slays the linnorm, it must succeed at a DC 48 Will save or gain weakness to fire 20 and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) from the agonizing pain it now endures at all times, with an unlimited duration. As long as a character continues to suffer this curse, its slowed condition can never be reduced below slowed 1.
**Lava Affinity** The linnorm can breathe and swim freely while submerged in lava and magma.
**[Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48)** Tail only. --- **Speed** 35 feet, climb 35 feet, fly 100 feet, swim 60 feet; [_unfettered movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732) **Melee** jaws +40 ([reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 4d12+19 piercing plus tor linnorm venom **Melee** claw +40 ([reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 4d8+19 slashing **Melee** tail +40 ([reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 4d6+19 bludgeoning plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=66) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 44 - **8th** [Truesight](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) - **Constant (9th)** [Unfettered Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732) **[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=57)** 3d6+21 bludgeoning, DC 46 **Pyroclastic Breath** ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The tor linnorm expels a 60-foot cone of flame and ash dealing 20d6 fire damage to creatures within the area (DC 46 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The linnorm can't use Pyroclastic Breath again for 1d4 rounds. At the start of the tor linnorm's next turn, the area of the Pyroclastic Breath is covered in thick, scorching smoke that burns both the lungs and eyes, dealing an additional 10d6 fire damage to all creatures in the area (DC 46 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that spends an entire round in the smoke with open eyes must succeed at a DC 44 Fortitude save or be [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=59) for 1 minute. The smoke dissipates after 1 minute; in strong winds, the smoke dissipates in 5 rounds, and in more powerful winds, it may clear even more quickly. **Slashing Claws** The tor linnorm makes four Strikes with their claws, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the tor linnorm's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the tor linnorm makes all their attacks. **Tor Linnorm Venom** ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 44 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 10 rounds; **Stage 1** 8d6 fire damage and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) (1 round); **Stage 2** 12d6 fire damage and drained 2 (1 round)
